messages.title: Let's Get Brexit Done
messages.content: And get on with our priorities. £33.9 billion for the NHS 20,000 extra police More funding for every pupil in every school

keyPolicies.policyTitle: No more housing developments that lack infrastructure support
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Combat housing developments that do not include necessary infrastructure support.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for local businesses, local high streets, and local jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide support to local businesses, high streets, and job creation in the constituency.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Boosting our schools to put children and young people on the road to a brighter future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase funding and resources for schools to ensure better education for children and young people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Conservative Youth Investment Fund to invest in facilities for young people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Utilize the Conservative Youth Investment Fund to improve facilities aimed at young people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Resident Safety - our share of extra local police from Conservatives 20,000 more police
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase the number of local police to enhance resident safety.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackling traffic gridlocks to support local businesses and commuters
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Address traffic congestion to aid local business operations and commuter conditions.

mentions.candidate: Feltham & Heston - a healthy flourishing place to live - no more litter, fly tipping Work with local communities & police to tackle crime, anti-social behaviour Protect our local NHS, mental health, elderly care & young people services

issues.education: Boosting our schools to put children and young people on the road to a brighter future. More funding for every pupil in every school.
issues.health: Protect our local NHS, mental health, elderly care & young people services. £33.9 billion for the NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: Support for local businesses, local high streets, and local jobs.
issues.lawCrime: Resident Safety - our share of extra local police from Conservatives 20,000 more police. Work with local communities & police to tackle crime, anti-social behaviour.
issues.transport: Tackling traffic gridlocks to support local businesses and commuters.
